Lettings Models¶

class lettings.models.Address(*args, **kwargs)¶

Address Model

This model represents an address for a related Letting object (rented location).

Parameters:

  • number (Positive Integer.) – Positive integer for street number.

  • street (String) – Name of the street.

  • city (String) – City’s name.

  • state (String, (max 2 characters).) – State’s code.

  • zip_code (Positive integer.) – Zip code.

  • country_iso_code (String, (max 3 characters)) – Country’s ISO code.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class lettings.models.Letting(*args, **kwargs)¶

Letting Model

Stores a single Letting entry.

Parameters:

  • title (String.) – String representing the title of the renting.

  • address (class:Address) – An instance of Address.

Methods: __str__(): Returns a string representation of the Letting.

Example:

print(str(letting)) # Output: “Cozy Apartment”

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Lettings Views¶

lettings.views.index(request)¶

View to display a list of all lettings.

Parameters:

request (django.http.HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

Returns:

Rendered HTML page displaying a list of all lettings.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse

lettings.views.letting(request, letting_id)¶

View to display an individual letting.

Parameters:

  • request (django.http.HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

  • letting_id (int) – The ID of the letting to display.

Returns:

Rendered HTML page displaying the requested letting.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse

Lettings Tests¶

lettings.tests.conftest.letting_fixture()¶

Fixture to create a fake instance of Address and Letting models.

Returns:

An instance of Letting.

Return type:

lettings.models.Letting

lettings.tests.test_index.test_index(client, letting_fixture)¶

Test the Lettings index view.

Parameters:

  • client (django.test.Client) – Django test client.

  • letting_fixture (lettings.models.Letting) – Fixture providing a fake Letting instance.

lettings.tests.test_letting.test_letting(client, letting_fixture)¶

Test the Letting view for an existing Letting.

Parameters:

  • client (django.test.Client) – Django test client.

  • letting_fixture (lettings.models.Letting) – Fixture providing a fake Letting instance.

lettings.tests.test_letting.test_letting_does_not_exist(client, letting_fixture)¶

Test the Letting view for a non-existent Letting.

Parameters:

  • client (django.test.Client) – Django test client.

  • letting_fixture (lettings.models.Letting) – Fixture providing a fake Letting instance.
